content.title: Transradial Arterial Access
content.description: Wrist access via the radial artery, increasingly used in peripheral intervention due to lower bleeding complications and patient comfort.
advantages: Dual blood supply to hand (ulnar artery)
limitations: Longer working distance for peripheral work

technique.allen_test: Pre-procedural assessment of dual hand circulation

complications.hand_ischemia: Very rare if Allen test normal
